results.deck: Arem is one of the industry's leading Directors and Producers, serving as the Director of Audio for Virgin Interactive Entertainment and EA Pacific. Arem has produced, directed and recorded over 500 commercial releases in the game, film, music, television, and graphic novel industries.
results.description:
Trivia

Keith's name is dropped in Saints Row The Third (of which he voice and mocap directed) as a cameo during the Gangstas in Space ending of the story. His name is briefly shown credited as the Director on the clapper board for the titular movie-within-a-game.
results.name: Keith Arem
